seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## Korl Launches Platform Orchestrating AI Agents from OpenAI, Gemini and Anthropic to Hyper-Customize Customer Messaging  

Korl has introduced a new **AI agent orchestration platform** that integrates multi-agent and multimodal AI from OpenAI, Gemini, and Anthropic to generate highly tailored customer messaging. The platform operates across multiple systems, enabling businesses to create personalized materials efficiently.  

### Why It Matters  
The ability to unify AI models from leading providers like OpenAI, Gemini, and Anthropic into a single orchestration platform could significantly streamline customer engagement workflows. By automating and optimizing messaging, businesses may achieve faster response times and deeper personalizationâ€”key differentiators in competitive markets. This move also highlights the growing trend of AI interoperability, where diverse models collaborate to enhance output quality.
